speaker: Help desk
message: Hi PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1

message: how can i help

message: ok.. let me check

message: have you tried to access the databases from anywhere?

speaker: Help desk
message: ok.. it may be because you are using this from your company's network... thus it triggers the block.. becos of the IP issue

speaker: Help desk
message: technically you should be avoiding the usage at work.. because the resources are not meant for internship purposes...

speaker: Help desk
message: it has implications if the IP gets tracked... we will have to investigate and probably flagged users up as a breech...

speaker: Help desk
message: because from the platform perspective.. companies are supposed to pay for their own subscription... so by leveraging on interns (Students) access.. it is a breech

speaker: Help desk
message: well.. just refrain if possible...
